title: Çırak
overview: Çırak, also known as Terekeme, is an assassin working for the mysterious organization 'The Company', which commits unsolved murders for its clients. Having experienced great injustices in the past, Çırak thinks that he is doing a good deed for humanity because the people who should be killed are bad people. However, one day, an event he witnesses changes his entire life and he finds himself in a struggle he never expected
